answer.main: Tap on the text-box 'ENTER YOUR NAME', enter your name and then press 'SAVE NAME'.
Tap on the button 'CREATE ROOM' and a new room will be created. Share the room id to others and wait for them to join.
The player who created the game will have the option to start the game, once 2 or more players have joined he/she can start.

sub.main: Tap on the link shared by your friend and it will join the game.

question: How to share the room id?

answer.main: Once you create/join room, click on the 'share room' button.
Once you join/create room, you have 3 different types of grid to select:

sub.main: Random: Create a grid with numbers filled randomly.
Simple: Create a grid with numbers filled sequentially.
Custom: Create a blank grid, start tapping on the grid to fill numbers the way you want.

answer.main: Anyone who crosses 5 lines(horizontal, vertical, diagonal) first, wins the game.

question: How many player can play in one room?

answer.main: At least 2 players are required to play, and at most 4 can join.
Game Stats option is there to check your previous played games' records.
